value.0:
Congratulations. Your once-in-a-lifetime contact with a being of alien intelligence has left your mortal mind with a permanent scar. Ever since hearing the primordial "voice" of the Zeitgeist, you suffer random lapses in your ability to comprehend time. 

When you thought it morning time, you walk outside only to discover twilight has come and gone. You may find yourself embarassingly early or shamefully late to engagements, simply because you misjudged the hour by a chime or two. Your mind feels, some days, as though it is completely disconnected from the flow of time, leaving you with a profound sense of liberation...provided you don't have a schedule to keep. 

Neither mundane nor magical Healers have any explanation for your dementation. Nor can they seem to find any cure for it, short of begging their divine patrons for a Miracle, and with a mental disorder that is not life-threatening, such a request of the gods would be met with derision. 

You will find a way to live with it and manage from day to day. This is merely a guide to understanding something that can enhance your roleplaying experience.
